title: Winnie the Pooh and the blustery day
creator_credit: Wolfgang Reitherman and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: A blustery wind sweeps through the Hundred Acre Wood, toppling Owl’s tree home, and making everyone, especially Pooh, very uneasy.
